About DevFlare

We are a student-led team crafting modern interfaces with Bootstrap 5. Our internship work focuses on speed, accessibility, and aesthetics.

Our Mission

Empower teams to build beautiful, performant websites quickly using well-structured components.

Values

Accessibility, clarity, and craftsmanship guide our design and coding choices.

Impact

We help teams ship faster without sacrificing quality or user experience.

Our Process

We study Bootstrap Examples, extract high-quality patterns, and compose them into polished, responsive pages.

  • Remix: Navbars, Cards, Forms, Modals, Carousel
  • Responsive layouts across desktop, tablet, mobile
  • Accessibility and semantic HTML
  • Deploy to GitHub Pages or Netlify with full source

We start with structure and spacing, then layer typography and subtle micro-interactions.

We keep dependencies minimal (CDNs), optimize images, and leverage Bootstrap utilities.

Yes. Our CSS overrides and variables allow easy branding updates without heavy refactors.
